rules_text: Sacrifice a creature: Transform Yumeko, Self-Centered. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]“Why would anyone in their right mind want to serve King Nightmare?”[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever Yumeko attacks, create two 1/1 red Nightmare creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens.
flavor_text2:
[i]“Because, my dear, the weak can't do anything when their friends die.”
—King Nightmare[/i]
